paragraph.paragraph: When you create a new project, icons in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfNewProjectDialog.htmNew Project dialog box and Add Project dialog box represent the available project types and their templates. The project template that is associated with the project icon you choose determines the output type and other options available for that project. Note: Some project types listed in this topic are not available in the Free Edition of EiffelEnvision. For more information, see ../../../introduction/editions.xmlEiffelEnvision Edition Features.

The following table lists the types of projects available for EiffelEnvision. 6004Available EiffelEnvision Projects
Project TemplateUsed to Create
Windows Application TemplateTraditional stand-alone Windows application or a rich front-end to a distributed Web application, Using ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vbcon/html/vboricreatingforms.htmWindows Forms. For more information, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vbcon/html/vboricreatingstandaloneappsvb.htmCreating Windows Applications.
Console Application TemplateCommand-line applications
Eiffel Graphical Application TemplateA stand-alone Windows application using the ../../../../../libraries/vision2/index.xmlEiffelVision 2 platform independent graphical library. Project are also ready to be designed using the ../../../../../libraries/vision2/index.xmlEiffelVision 2 graphical builder.
wizards/blank_eiffel_graphical_application.xmlBlank Eiffel Graphical Application TemplateA stand-alone Windows application using the ../../../../../libraries/vision2/index.xmlEiffelVision 2 platform independent graphical library.
wizards/windows_eiffel_application.xmlWindows Eiffel Application TemplateA standalone Windows application using the ../../../../../libraries/wel/index.xmlWindows Eiffel Library (WEL).
Class Library TemplateReusable class or component that can be shared with other projects. This project type is considered windowless and will not contain a ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vbcon/html/vboricreatingforms.htmWindows Forms class. For more information, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vbcon/html/vbconComponentClassDesign.htmComponent Classes.
wizards/eiffel_class_library.xmlEiffel Class (Precompile) Library TemplateReusable class or component that can be shared with other projects, specifically designed for reuse by other EiffelEnvision projects. Eiffel Class Library projects are also known in Eiffel as ../configuring/adding_references/precompiled_libraries.xmlPrecompiled Libraries.
wizards/eiffel_class_library.xmlEmpty Project TemplateConfigurable empty project, with rudimentary options. For creating application or libraries by specifying the root class and creation routine.
